entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
